name: Gavin II's Edible Sand
author: bd.weld
summary: My niece asked me to make some edible sand for her son's first birthday to go along with the Finding Nemo® theme and this is what I came up with. Even the party guests were fooled. This is great for kid or adult themed beach parties. For a lighter colored sand use more sugar.
ingredients: ¼ cup white sugar, or more to taste
directions: Process whole graham crackers and chocolate graham cracker in a food processor to a sand-like consistency
Stir sugar and graham cracker crumbs together in a bowl, adding sugar as needed to reach desired color
